scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.generate:types:local: npx supabase gen types typescript --local > common/supabase.types.ts
scripts.generate:types: npx supabase gen types typescript --project-id rcbddkhvysexkvgqpcud > common/supabase.types.ts
scripts.s:start:local: env-cmd -f supabase-local.env npx supabase start --workdir supabase-prod
scripts.s:link: env-cmd -f supabase-local.env npx supabase link --project-ref rcbddkhvysexkvgqpcud --workdir supabase-prod
scripts.s:local:diff: npx supabase db diff --schema auth,storage,public --workdir supabase-prod
scripts.s:diff:linked: npx supabase db diff --schema auth,storage,public --linked --workdir supabase-prod
scripts.s:diff:linked:f: npx supabase db diff --schema auth,storage,public --linked -f latest_diff --workdir supabase-prod
scripts.s:dump: npx supabase db dump -f supabase/schema.sql --workdir supabase-prod
scripts.s:restart: npx supabase stop && npx supabase start --workdir supabase-prod
scripts.s:pull: npx supabase db pull --schema auth,public,storage --workdir supabase-prod
scripts.s:seed: env-cmd -f .env.local npx supabase db dump --data-only -f supabase/seed.sql --workdir supabase-prod
scripts.staging:link: env-cmd -f .env.staging npx supabase link --project-ref cwguucpncwbqgmjqapsz --workdir supabase-staging
scripts.staging:reset: env-cmd -f .env.staging npx supabase db reset --workdir supabase-staging
scripts.staging:pull: env-cmd -f .env.staging npx supabase db pull --schema auth,public,storage --workdir supabase-staging
scripts.staging:push: env-cmd -f .env.staging npx supabase db push --workdir supabase-staging
scripts.staging:diff:linked:f: env-cmd -f .env.staging npx supabase db diff --linked --schema auth,public,storage -f latest_diff --workdir supabase-staging
scripts.dev:local: env-cmd -f supabase-local.env concurrently "npm run s:start" "npm run frontend" "npm run backend"
scripts.dev:live: env-cmd -f .env.local concurrently "npm run frontend" "npm run backend"
scripts.frontend:local: env-cmd -f supabase-local.env npm --prefix frontend run dev
scripts.backend:local: env-cmd -f supabase-local.env npm --prefix backend run start:watch
scripts.check-translation:strict: cd frontend && npx tsx src/scripts/check-translations.ts strict
